references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRFs, a foundational model for novel view synthesis that is extensively used and built upon in this paper's methods.
This paper introduces diffusion models, which are the core generative models used for inpainting in this paper's approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a high-resolution image generation model that is the main inpainting model used in this work.

references.paper_title: SPIn-NeRF: Multiview segmentation and perceptual inpainting with neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper is a direct predecessor, addressing similar 3D inpainting challenges using NeRFs, and is used as a baseline comparison.

references.paper_title: Vica-nerf: View-consistency-aware 3d editing of neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper is another very recent and closely related work addressing multi-view consistency in 3D editing, serving as a relevant baseline and comparison.
